item.title: Yash Kant
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

About Bio: I am a final year undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee. I’m fascinated by AutoML and I am working on Neural Architecture Search these days. I am also starting with Reinforcement Learning which I would like to work on next. Background: During my freshman and sophomore years I enjoyed software development (mainly on Android). I have interned at Microsoft, Bangalore with the Azure Team. I have done a few projects in Resource Efficient ML and Adversarial ML.
